data: Aunt Rosa | Uncle Lazarro | Frank Sinatra | Dean Martin

If Aunt Rosa and Uncle Lazarro hadn’t wasted sixteen years bickering over who was the better singer—Frank Sinatra or Dean Martin—they probably would have ended up married years ago... and I would never have found myself trying to factor a mob boss into the wedding party.
